author: Nintendo of America
description:
Winter Burrow is available now for Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/winter-burrow-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01  

Winter Burrow is a cozy woodland survival game about a mouse returning home to restore their childhood burrow. Explore, gather resources, craft, knit warm sweaters, bake pies, and meet the locals! 

#NintendoSwitch #WinterBurrow 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

title: Winter Burrow – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
